summary: Free Energy in Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery
body:
Free Energy in Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery

I haven’t seen many of these lists online, and the couple that I’ve seen do not include every place you can tap to get free energy. So, below I have listed all the locations that I know where I find energy:

  • MAGICAL CREATURES RESERVE - The wolf-like creature to the right.
  • EAST TOWERS - The blank portrait of the lady behind you and to the right is Peeves by the Divination Classroom.
  • WEST TOWERS - The painting of some wood and flowers to the right where oranges will appear.
  • LOWER FLOOR (WEST) - The torch to the right of the Great Hall and the statue of the middle knight to the right of the torch.
  • DUNGEONS - To the right by the corner that is before the Potion Classroom is a sleeping house elf.
  • CASTLE GROUNDS - There is a stick on the ground past the Whomping Willow.
  • LOWER FLOOR (EAST) - There is a mess of books on a bench next to the library.
  • HOGSMEADE - Down one of the alleyways between the buildings is a blond-haired boy holding a sled and waving.
  • FORBIDDEN FOREST - Right in front of the Spider’s Lair is a web to the left.
  • DIAGON ALLEY - The money bag on the ground in front of Gringotts.
  • FAMILIARS - If you have already purchased a familiar, they can sometimes give you free energy if you tap them.

TOTAL: +13 energy!

When new spaces are added and other things are unlocked, I will update this post.

summary: So I just went to see crimes of Grindelwald and, leaving the plot alone to avoid spoilers and a rant....what was with all the...
body: So I just went to see crimes of Grindelwald and, leaving the plot alone to avoid spoilers and a rant….what was with all the floating heads??? Surely every conversation that conveys vital information to other characters doesn’t need a disembodied image of the subject superimposed over the top? Or am I doing something wrong?

reblog.comment: So I just went to see crimes of Grindelwald and, leaving the plot alone to avoid spoilers and a rant….what was with all the floating heads??? Surely every conversation that conveys vital information to other characters doesn’t need a disembodied image of the subject superimposed over the top? Or am I doing something wrong?

Surely every conversation that conveys vital information to other characters doesn’t need a disembodied image of the subject superimposed over the top? Or am I doing something wrong?

tags: fantastic beasts the crimes of grindelwald
fantastic beasts and where to find them
summary: After seeing "The Crimes of Grindelwald" the word "Muggle" is the funniest thing in the world to me. You know why? Because of...
body:
After seeing “The Crimes of Grindelwald” the word “Muggle” is the funniest thing in the world to me. You know why? Because of that scene in which Grindelwald is naming all the other words for them. Like just imagine wizards from all around the world meeting and talking about what non magical people are called in their country.

American wizard: We call them “No-Maj”, because they are no magical people.

French wizard: We call them “Non magique”, because that’s the French version of none magical.

Wizard from other country: We call them “Can’t-spells”, because they can’t cast spells.

British wizard: We call them Muggles.

Everyone else:…

American wizard: But why?

British wizard: I don’t know, but it sounds funny

blog.name: randomhptheories
blog.title: Random HP theories
blog.description: literally what it is

body:
SPOILER ALERT!

The Prophecy

„A son cruelly banished,

Despair of a daughter,

Return, great avenger,

With wings from the water“

That’s how the prophecy, supposedly about Lestrange family, goes. But are we sure that it is indeed about them ? May it be about someone else?

From the sources we possess, we know that the wizard who made the prophecy was in fact a very accomplished seer. Tycho Dodonus even released a book of prophecies and among them is the prophecy in question. 

It wouldn’t be the first time the prophecy was interpreted wrong or had several possible outcomes (f.e. Neville could’ve been the Chosen One).

What if son and daughter point to the male and female separately, not related? Then who and what will be avenged?

We know that Queenie took Grindewald‘s side in the end of the second Fantastic Beasts movie. We saw how Newt, Tina and Jacob reacted. They were shocked, they were broken.

So what if:

- Newt is the son cruelly banished, since he was expelled from Hogwarts

- Tina is the daughter, who’s in despair since her sister turned against her

- Jacob is a great avenger, which sounds really dumb, but we wanna believe he has some purpose apart from being „the goofy outsider“, some random no-maj, so he might surprise us all

__________________________

This is just a theory, not even a serious one. However, Crimes of Grindewald left us with a lot of questions, so theories are bound to be made. If Credence really is Aurelius Dumbledor, Jacob might as well turn out to be the Great Avenger.

blog.name: thestudyden
blog.title: The Study Den
blog.description: Sol, 18, second year Professional Economics at the University of Western Australia. Formerly @Study-Matters | Follow my blog at thestudyden.wixsite.com/studyblr for The Study Buddies Project, Free Printables & More.

summary: So I know that I get a lot of questions of how I take my notes, and the Cornell method is a favourite of many in the studyblr...
caption:
So I know that I get a lot of questions of how I take my notes, and the Cornell method is a favourite of many in the studyblr community. The way this method works is you write key words and questions on the right hand column, and detailed notes on the right. Later, you can come back and test yourself!

Additionally, I know that the majority of us are huge Harry Potter fans! And thus, these printables came to be. They are designed to help you efficiently take notes and study, in a fun, stylish way that also demonstrates your house pride. 

You can now find the pack of 4 printables on my Etsy here along with other cool templates you can get. 

I hope you guys love these as much as I do, and I’d love to see some support!

Additionally, I know that the majority of us are huge Harry Potter fans! And thus, these printables came to be. They are designed to help you efficiently take notes and study, in a fun, stylish way that also demonstrates your house pride. 

You can now find the pack of 4 printables on my Etsy here along with other cool templates you can get. 

I hope you guys love these as much as I do, and I’d love to see some support!
